Title: The Judge (No. 57)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Jonathan Shapiro, Lukas Reiter
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Red investigates Jolene's life; Liz and Ressler go after a criminal known as The Judge, who incarcerates the ones that put innocent men away.
